article_text: Many aspiring investors call Realtors every day declaring, “I’d like to buy some short sales and foreclosures in Miami.” The problem is that many of these “newbie” investors don’t really understand that there isn’t necessarily any more investment value in a short sale or a foreclosure versus a traditional sale, solely based on the fact that it falls into that category.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Carlos Gutierrez Realtor Gutierrez Group Miami Real Estate at Keller Williams Miami Beach 2016 Residential Board foreclosures 2016 president-elect of the Miami Association of Realtors Residential Board
article_metadata.title: How does my neighbor’s foreclosure affect my home value? | Miami Herald

article_summary: Many aspiring investors call Realtors every day declaring, “I’d like to buy some short sales and foreclosures in Miami.” The problem is that many of these “newbie” investors don’t really understand that there isn’t necessarily any more investment value in a short sale or a foreclosure versus a traditional sale, solely based on the fact that it falls into that category.
